titleStmt.title: By the King. Whereas in Nouember last, by our proclamation vvee commanded from Court all idle persons ...
Proclamations. 1619-06-30
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Sending away hangers-on at the Court.
Dated at end: Greenwich, the last day of Iune, in the seuenteenth yeere of our raigne ..
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
